unit.name: Shah
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Lord of the Plains, Infernal Armour, Iron Rain

unit.name: Hobgoblin Conjurer
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm

unit.name: Hobgoblin Chief
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Infernal Armour, Shield, Iron Rain, Weapon Master, Bow (2+), Lance, Paired Weapons

unit.name: Hob Slingers
unit.description: 10-20 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Vanguard (6"), Hard Target (1), Boiling Oil, Iron Rain, Paired Weapons, Sling (4+)

unit.name: Mountain Wolf Cavalry
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard (6"), Light Armour, Shield, Hobgoblin Rider: Iron Rain, Bow (4+), Lance, Mountain Wolf: Harnessed

unit.name: Hob Cataphracts
unit.description: 10-20 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield, Veteran: Iron Rain, Weapon Master, Bow (4+), Lance, Paired Weapons, Bear-Dog: Harnessed, Stomp Attacks (1)

unit.name: Eternals
unit.description: 8-15 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Scoring, Infernal Armour, Hunter: Hobgoblin Scimitar, Bear-Dog: Harnessed, Stomp Attacks (1)

unit.name: Tusker Mahouts
unit.description: 3-5 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Hobgoblin Mahout (3): Halberd, Plains Tusker: Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3)

unit.name: Tyrannical Disciples
unit.description: 20-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard (Drum Gogyag), Devotees of Tyranny, Scoring, Light Armour, Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Hatred

unit.name: Drum Gogyag
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 60x100 mm, Giant Drum, Musician, Not a Leader, War Platform, Drummer (4): Halberd, Gogyag: Harnessed

unit.name: Blasted Plains Emissaries
unit.description: 20-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Scoring, Infernal Armour, Shield, Iron Rain

unit.name: Sky Mountain Emissaries
unit.description: 3-8 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x60 mm, Scoring, Infernal Armour, Emissary: Saddle Cannon (4+), Colossal Camel: Harnessed

unit.name: Hob Ballista
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, War Machine, Light Armour, Iron Rain, Move or Fire, Ballista (4+)

mount.name: Mountain Wolf
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard (6"), Harnessed

mount.name: Bear-Dog
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Harnessed, Stomp Attacks (1)

mount.name: Plains Tusker
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Plains Tusker: Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3), Hobgoblin Mahout (2): Halberd

mount.name: Alpha Karkadan
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fearless, Magic Resistance (2), Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6+1), Sharp Horn

item.name: Warrior Vassals
item.description: The total Combat Score bonus gained by each player from Duels (from lost Health Points on enemy units and Overkill), is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 0.

item.name: Iron Rain
item.description: Shooting - Shooting Attacks made by the model while Located in the targets Flank or Rear Arc gain +1 to hit and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Infernal Armour
item.description: Armour Equipment - Plate Armour. The wearer gains Aegis (5+, against Flaming Attacks).

item.name: Blunderbuss
Blunderbuss (5+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon - Range 12", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 3, Accurate, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire. Does not suffer the negative to-hit modifier from a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction.

item.name: Flintlock Axe
Flintlock Axe (3+)
Flintlock Axe (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon - Range 18", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 2. Counts as a Close Combat Weapon with Two-Handed in close combat. Close Combat Attacks made with it gain +1 Strength. Can be enchanted like a Close Combat Weapon, but only Close Combat Attacks are affected by the Weapon Enchantment unless specifically stated otherwise. The model may shoot from the third rank (in addition to the first and second).

item.name: Hobgoblin Scimitar
item.description: Close Combat Weapon - Two-Handed. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Armour Penetration. In addition, attacks made with this weapon that are allocated towards models that are Large and Beast, Large and Cavalry, or Gigantic gain +2 Strength.

item.name: Wicked Serrations
item.description: Enchantment: Hobgoblin Scimitar. Single model units that have suffered one or more Health Point losses due to attacks from this weapon suffer −1 Resilience and −1 Attack Value until the end of the Combat Phase.

item.name: Elemental Plate
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains Aegis (4+, against Close Combat Attacks). This Aegis Save cannot be used against Close Combat Attacks made with a Hand Weapon. In addition, the wearer gains Aegis (4+, against Flaming Attacks).

item.name: Deaths Head Aura
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. If on foot, the wearer gains +2 Armour. If mounted, the wearer gains +1 Armour instead. In addition, the wearer gains Aegis (3+, against Special Attacks).

item.name: Green Tide
item.description: 0-3 per Army. The bearers unit gains Fight in Extra Rank.

item.name: Predator Pennant
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count toward Core. The bearers unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting).

item.name: Breath of the Brass Bull
item.description: Cannot be taken by models with Towering Presence. The bearers model gains +1 Health Point and the bearer gains Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks).

item.name: Zartoshts Chains
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with the bearers model suffer −2 Defensive Skill. The roll for Flee Distance of enemy units in base contact with the bearers model is subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Lord of the Plains
item.description: Universal Rule. While joined by a mounted model with this rule, Cavalry units gain Strider.

item.name: Sharp Horn
item.description: Attack Attribute. The model part may reroll the roll for the number of Impact Hits.

item.name: Infernal Lackey
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Infernal Armour and Flintlock Axe (3+). Its Discipline is set to 8, and it must select spells from Pyromancy.

item.name: Archery Commander
item.description: Universal Rule. Units in Line Formation joined by the model never count as having moved for the purpose of Volley Fire.

item.name: Cavalry Commander
item.description: Universal Rule. The model must take a mount. Cavalry units containing one or more model with this rule gain Devastating Charge (+1" Adv).

item.name: Boiling Oil
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. If one or more simultaneous attacks with Boiling Oil hit, after resolving these attacks, the target unit gains one Boiling Oil marker. If a unit with one or more Boiling Oil markers is targeted by Shooting Attacks with Iron Rain, the shooting models are considered to be Located in the targets Rear Arc for the purpose of Iron Rain (not for the purpose of other rules like Area Attack). Remove all markers from a unit when it suffers one or more Health Point losses from attacks with Iron Rain or at the end of the Shooting Phase, whichever comes first.

item.name: Sling
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0. When shooting from Short Range, the Strength of attacks made with this weapon is set to 4.

item.name: Devotees of Tyranny
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Fearless and Frenzy while Engaged in Combat. In addition, units consisting entirely of models with Devotees of Tyranny and, if applicable, a Drum Gogyag, may reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase.

item.name: Giant Drum
item.description: Universal Rule. The model must be deployed in, and can only join Blasted Plains Emissaries, Hob Levies, or Tyrannical Disciples units. The model can never voluntarily leave its unit. In addition, the range of the models March to the Beat, and to enemy units that are required to take a March Test due to the Drum Gogyags unit, are both extended to 12".

item.name: Saddle Cannon
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 24", Shots D6, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Ballista
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)].
